Dina ne upjaau ko jawab diya.
Kaue ke sir par sona milta hai.
Adhyapak gajar ka halwa banaate hain.
Bandaron ki baarish ho rahi thi.
Chamakte hue taaron ke saath mat khelo.
Hinglish: Achaar mein kachra nahi hai.
Raaton raat humne rona shuru kiya.
Mukaam se aage zameen aane lagi.
Raat mein adrak mendhak ban jaata hai.
Jhoot ki hamesha jeet hoti hai.
